description.value:
The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is &Reference[grappled]{grappled} (escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d8 + @mod type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature &Reference[grappled]{grappled} by it. The engulfed target is &Reference[blinded]{blinded}, &Reference[restrained]{restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a [[/save con 14 format=long]] at the start of each of the moundâ€™s turns or take [[/damage 2d8 + 4 type=bludgeoning average=true]] damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

&Reference[lightning]{Lightning} Absorption. Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the &Reference[lightning]{lightning} damage dealt.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
